Room.Name: Second Floor Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the west end of the main second floor hallway in the Kista Towers.
Room.LongDescription: The long hallway proceeds east from here and ends at a wall some eighty meters down. On the west wall, there are life-size portraits of Lord Aaileman and Lady Drianna. The floor is covered with a fine red carpet made completely of rare minusk fur. There is an orange door to the north next to the northern hallway, and a sky-blue painted door to the south.
